components.name: Amazon Route 53
components.description: A DNS service that directs traffic to the application.

components.name: Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)
components.description: Distributes incoming application traffic across multiple web servers to ensure no single server is overwhelmed.

components.name: Web Servers
components.description: Handle incoming requests and serve dynamic content.

components.name: Amazon RDS
components.description: Manages relational databases, ensuring data persistence and availability.

components.name: Amazon S3 Bucket
components.description: Stores static assets such as images and files, accessible via the application.

data_flows.description: Routes user requests to the ELB for traffic distribution.
Distributes incoming traffic to web servers for processing.
Web servers interact with RDS for data retrieval and storage.
Web servers retrieve static content from the S3 bucket.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data processing from public access.

trust_boundaries.name: Static Content Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates static content storage from dynamic content processing.
